reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Sometimes a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Incredibly knowledgeable and helpful during office hours.

reviews.review: Challenging exams but fair grading. Lectures can be dry.

reviews.review: Interesting course with plenty of hands-on activities.

reviews.review: Lectures are monotonous, but the material is important.

reviews.review: Passionate about literature, makes every class engaging.

reviews.review: Challenging projects, but very rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but lectures are sometimes disorganized.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Good at breaking down complex concepts, but fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Very approachable and makes difficult topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Philosophical debates are interesting, but grading is tough.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but lectures can be repetitive.

reviews.review: Provides great insights into the subject, but workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Very talented and enthusiastic about music theory.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Hands-on fieldwork is a highlight of the course.
